ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?
ygData.msgSnippet: dunno about that.  i saw Rat, but he s still very red to me so i just smile and walk by him.
ygData.messageBody:
dunno about that. i saw Rat, but he's still very red to me so i just smile and walk by him.

Su wrote:

> Sorry, I meant with killing the troll in the nearby bar.. Does that give
> negative faction hits?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> > i don't think there are any negative factions hits to him, and there are
> something like 5 positives. i have him 8 bottles of
> > wine at lvl 1 and dinged 2 <G>
> >
> > Su wrote:
> >
> > >
> > > Ok, but it does'nt damage my faction with the dead? or indigo
> brotherhood?
> > > Bc I can't figure how to raise those factions without pissing off
> someone
> > > else.
> > > luv,
> > > -Su
> > >
> > > > You can easily get your faction up by giving Lokar To'Biath 16 red
> wines
> > > > after each three kills. Lokar is in 3rd gate library.
> > > >
> > > > ~Daikun Paradin
> > > > Shadow Knight
> > > > Guardian of Innoruuk
> > > > Karana Server
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: "Su" <suceress@...>
> > > > To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> > > > Sent: Sunday, August 05, 2001 9:32 AM
> > > > Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > >
> > > > > What faction is he though? I don't want to ruin faction with anyone.
> > > > > And what lvl do I have to be to kill him?
> > > > > luv,
> > > > > -Su
> > > > >
> > > > > > If you are non-kos in Neriak go kill a Troll name Ratraz in
> Maiden's
> > > > > Fancy,
> > > > > > 3rd gate. Great exp, great loot. *grin*
> > > > > >
> > > > > > ~Daikun Paradin
> > > > > > Dark Elf, Shadow Knight
> > > > > > Karana Server
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: "Richard Ong" <nakor@...>
> > > > > > To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 10:57 AM
> > > > > > Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Easy way to get plat?
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > > Yeah... I'd say you'd get slaughtered~~~ heh. they con blue or
> > > > > > > yellow at 34+ plus I don't think they give that much money
> anyway.
> > > > > > > And you need good magic resist cuz they can fear you. As for
> you
> > > > > > > clerics, you just need a good group to kill these things. I
> don't
> > > > > > > know many clerics who solo anyway if that's waht you were
> thinking
> > > > > > > (those that are clerics anyway). I'm sure you can do it at 35+
> > > > > > > though if you got a good group.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > --- In EverQuest@y..., Denis Baldwin <dbaldwin@c...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > Well, I was thinking of group against specs. What do you think
> of
> > > > > > > that? Good
> > > > > > > > choice @ 19? or will I get slaughtered?
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > Denis
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > >
